additionRate: Desired addition rate of tartaric acid (g/L)

results.amountKg: Kilograms of tartaric acid to add
results.amountG: Grams of tartaric acid to add

info: Tartaric acid (L(+)-tartaric acid) is the primary acid used in European winemaking for acidity correction. When making additions to a red fermentation, this formula does not take into account the ratio of juice to solids (grapeskins, seeds, etc.). Standard addition: 1 g/L increases total acidity by approximately 1 g/L.
